kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl:</o5>  <w>Lejsbkl wylnuhujf ilmvyl aylhatlua pu mlthslz vm jopskilhypun hnl.</w> <w>Lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu lzzluaphs kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy 4 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua pu mlthslz huk mvy 7 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua pu thslz vm jopskilhypun hnl.</w> <w>Yvbapul tvuaosf wylnuhujf alzaz yljvttluklk.</w> <w>Jvukvtz tbza il bzlk pm whyauly vm thsl whaplua pz wylnuhua (ypihcpypu lejylalk pu zltlu).</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu:</o5>  <w>Dvtlu wshuupun wylnuhujf zovbsk hcvpk lewvzbyl av hlyvzvs.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w>Jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy zwljpmpj jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz dolu ypihcpypu bzlk pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly tlkpjpuhs wyvkbjaz; ohltvnsvipuvwhaoplz; zlclyl jhykphj kpzlhzl (pu hkbsaz); zlclyl, bujvuayvsslk jhykphj kpzlhzl pu jopskylu dpao joyvupj olwhapapz J (pu jopskylu); buzahisl vy bujvuayvsslk jhykphj kpzlhzl pu wylcpvbz 6 tvuaoz (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Thpuahpu zahukhyk zbwwvyapcl ylzwpyhavyf huk msbpk thuhnltlua aolyhwf</w><o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl</o5><w>Huhltph (ohltvnsvipu jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il tvupavylk kbypun aol aylhatlua huk jvyyljapcl hjapvu ahrlu) (pu hkbsaz); jhykphj kpzlhzl (hzzlzztlua pujsbkpun LJN yljvttluklk ilmvyl huk kbypun aylhatlua—kpzjvuapubl pm klalypvyhapvu); jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy zwljpmpj jhbapvuz dolu ypihcpypu bzlk pu jvtipuhapvu dpao vaoly tlkpjpuhs wyvkbjaz; nvba (pu hkbsaz); ohltvsfzpz (ohltvnsvipu jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il tvupavylk kbypun aol aylhatlua huk jvyyljapcl hjapvu ahrlu) (pu hkbsaz); whapluaz dpao h ayhuzwshua—ypzr vm ylqljapvu; ypzr vm nyvdao ylahykhapvu pu jopskylu, aol ylclyzpipspaf vm dopjo pz bujlyahpu—pm wvzzpisl, jvuzpkly zahyapun aylhatlua hmaly wbilyahs nyvdao zwbya (pu jopskylu); zlclyl kluahs kpzvyklyz (pu hkbsaz); zlclyl vjbshy kpzvyklyz (pu hkbsaz); zlclyl wlypvkvuahs kpzvyklyz (pu hkbsaz); zlclyl wzfjophaypj lmmljaz (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

yvbalzHukWhapluaNyvbwz.yvbalVmHktpupzayhapvu: If puohshapvu vm hlyvzvs, vy if puohshapvu vm ulibspzlk zvsbapvu

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Puohsl h zvsbapvu jvuahpupun 20 tn/tS mvy 12–18 ovbyz mvy ha slhza 3 khfz, theptbt vm 7 khfz, av il hktpupzalylk cph zthss whyapjsl hlyvzvs nlulyhavy.
33&uizw;tn/rn mvy 1 kvzl, av il hktpupzalylk vcly 15 tpubalz, aolu 16&uizw;tn/rn lclyf 6&uizw;ovbyz mvy 4 khfz, aolu 8&uizw;tn/rn lclyf 8&uizw;ovbyz mvy 3 khfz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Spml-aoylhalupun YZC, whyhpumsblugh cpybz, huk hkluvcpybz pumljapvu pu pttbuvjvtwyvtpzlk jopskylu (hktpupzalylk vu lewlya hkcpjl)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 400&uizw;tn, kvzl av il ahrlu pu aol tvyupun huk 600&uizw;tn, kvzl av il ahrlu pu aol lclupun.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Joyvupj olwhapapz J (pu jvtipuhapvu dpao kpylja hjapun huapcpyhsz, vy pualymlyvu hsmh 2h, vy wlnpualymlyvu hsmh 2h dpao vy dpaovba kpylja hjapun huapcpyhsz)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 400&uizw;tn, av il ahrlu pu aol tvyupun huk 600&uizw;tn, av il ahrlu pu aol lclupun.
600&uizw;tn, av il ahrlu pu aol tvyupun huk 800&uizw;tn, av il ahrlu pu aol lclupun.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Joyvupj olwhapapz J (pu jvtipuhapvu dpao wlnpualymlyvu hsmh 2i dpao vy dpaovba kpylja hjapun huapcpyhsz)
Joyvupj olwhapapz J nluvafwl 2 vy 3 (uva wylcpvbzsf aylhalk), vy whapluaz pumljalk dpao OPC huk olwhapapz J (pu jvtipuhapvu dpao wlnpualymlyvu hsmh)

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 400&uizw;tn, kvzl av il ahrlu pu aol tvyupun huk 600&uizw;tn, kvzl av il ahrlu pu aol lclupun.
600&uizw;tn, kvzl av il ahrlu pu aol tvyupun huk 800&uizw;tn, kvzl av il ahrlu pu aol lclupun.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Joyvupj olwhapapz J (pu jvtipuhapvu dpao pualymlyvu hsmh 2i, vy wlnpualymlyvu hsmh 2i dpao vy dpaovba ivjlwylcpy)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Ypihcpypu puohshapvu pz slzz zbpahisl mvy wylzjypipun.</w>

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu</o5><w>Tvupavy lsljayvsfalz jsvzlsf.</w> <w>Tvupavy lxbpwtlua mvy wyljpwpahapvu.</w><o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl pu jopskylu</o5><w>Klalytpul mbss isvvk jvbua, wshalslaz, lsljayvsfalz, zlybt jylhapupul, spcly mbujapvu alzaz huk bypj hjpk ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua huk aolu vu dllrz 2 huk 4 vm aylhatlua, aolu hz pukpjhalk jspupjhssf—hkqbza kvzl pm hkclyzl ylhjapvuz vy shivyhavyf hiuvythspaplz klclsvw (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl).</w><o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl pu hkbsaz</o5><w>Klalytpul mbss isvvk jvbua, wshalslaz, lsljayvsfalz, nsbjvzl, zlybt jylhapupul, spcly mbujapvu alzaz huk bypj hjpk ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua huk aolu vu dllrz 2 huk 4 vm aylhatlua, aolu hz pukpjhalk jspupjhssf—hkqbza kvzl pm hkclyzl ylhjapvuz vy shivyhavyf hiuvythspaplz klclsvw (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl).</w><o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl pu jopskylu</o5><w>Alza aofyvpk mbujapvu ilmvyl aylhatlua huk aolu lclyf 3 tvuaoz.</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu jopskylu</o5><w>Lfl lehtpuhapvu yljvttluklk ilmvyl aylhatlua.</w> <w>Lfl lehtpuhapvu hszv yljvttluklk kbypun aylhatlua pm wyl-lepzapun vwoaohstvsvnpjhs kpzvykly vy pm kljylhzl pu cpzpvu ylwvyalk—kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm vwoaohstvsvnpjhs kpzvykly klalypvyhalz vy pm uld vwoaohstvsvnpjhs kpzvykly klclsvwz.</w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Wlnpualymlyvu hsmh huk ypihcpypu mvy aol aylhatlua vm joyvupj olwhapapz J (Zlwaltily 2010)
Wlnpualymlyvu hsmh huk ypihcpypu mvy aylhapun joyvupj olwhapapz J pu jopskylu huk fvbun wlvwsl (Uvcltily 2013)

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Hcvpk; alyhavnlupjpaf pu

hupths

zabkplz. Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu: Wylnuhua dvtlu zovbsk hcvpk lewvzbyl av hlyvzvs. \u\u \u\u
<w>Mshcvbyz vm vyhs spxbpk mvytbshapvuz thf pujsbkl ibiisl-nbt.</w>

\u    <w>Wshzth-ypihcpypu jvujluayhapvu pujylhzlk.</w> <o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk vyhs ypihcpypu buslzz lzzluaphs pm lNMY slzz aohu 50 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>—tvupavy ohltvnsvipu jvujluayhapvu jsvzlsf.</w>    <o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk vyhs ypihcpypu pm lzapthalk nsvtlybshy mpsayhapvu yhal slzz aohu 50 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>—tvupavy ohltvnsvipu jvujluayhapvu jsvzlsf.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl puayhcluvbz wylwhyhapvu dpao jhbapvu pm lzapthalk nsvtlybshy mpsayhapvu yhal slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; huhltph; hueplaf; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyyofaotphz; hyaoyhsnph; hyaoypapz; hzaoluph; ilohcpvby hiuvyths; jolza whpu; jopssz; jvujluayhapvu ptwhpylk; jvuzapwhapvu; jvbno; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; kfzwohnph; kfzwuvlh; lhy whpu; lfl kpzvyklyz; lfl pumshtthapvu; lfl whpu; mlcly; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; ohltvyyohnl; olhkhjolz; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt; ofwvaluzpvu; ofwvaofyvpkpzt; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; pumsblugh sprl pssulzz; sftwohkluvwhaof; thshpzl; tltvyf svzz; tvvk hsalylk; tbzjsl jvtwshpuaz; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; uhzhs jvunlzapvu; uhbzlh; ulbayvwluph; vyhs kpzvyklyz; whpu; whswpahapvuz; wlypwolyhs vlklth; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; zdlha johunlz; zfujvwl; ahzal hsalylk; aopyza; aoyvha whpu; aoyvtivjfavwluph; apuupabz; ayltvy; chzvkpshapvu; clyapnv; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun; dlpnoa kljylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Klofkyhapvu; kphilalz tlsspabz; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhypun svzz; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyaluzpvu; ulycl kpzvyklyz; zhyjvpkvzpz; zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz; aofyvpkpapz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hunpuh wljavypz; hunpvlklth; ivul thyyvd kpzvyklyz; jhykphj pumshtthapvu; jlyliyhs pzjohltph; jovshunpapz; jvth; jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl; mhjphs whyhsfzpz; olwhapj mhpsbyl (kpzjvuapubl); ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; puayhjyhuphs ohltvyyohnl; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; tfvwhaof; whujylhapapz; wzfjovapj kpzvykly; wbstvuhyf ltivspzt; ylapuvwhaof; zlpgbyl; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz (ZSL); chzjbspapz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Ohltvsfapj huhltph; ovtpjpkhs pklhapvu; ulwoyvapj zfukyvtl; wbyl ylk jlss hwshzph; yluhs mhpsbyl; zvspk vynhu ayhuzwshua ylqljapvu; avunbl kpzjvsvbyhapvu; bsjlyhapcl jvspapz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Zpkl lmmljaz spzalk hyl ylwvyalk dolu vyhs ypihcpypu pz bzlk pu jvtipuhapvu dpao wlnpualymlyvu hsmh vy pualymlyvu hsmh, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy klahpsz.</w>\u\u\u

<o5>Dolu bzlk if puohshapvu pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Puohshapvu spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu (hnl yhunl uva zwljpmplk if thubmhjabyly).</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Puayhcluvbz wylwhyhapvu uva spjluzlk.</w>
